Package com.SDD.graphic.controller

Class WindowController

java.lang.Object
com.SDD.graphic.controller.WindowController
public abstract class WindowController extends Object
An abstract class for controlling window on a canvas.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    changeWindow(Segment window, ArrayList<Double> windowSize, javafx.scene.control.TextField xField, javafx.scene.control.TextField yField, javafx.scene.control.TextField xPrimeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField yPrimeField)
    Changes the values of the window based on the current values in the text fields.
    static void
    drawWindow(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, Segment window)
    Draws the window on the canvas using a red color and a 2-pixel wide stroke.
    static boolean
    isWindowGood(Segment window, ArrayList<Double> windowSize)
    Checks if the current window is valid, meaning that its x and y values are less than its xPrime and yPrime values, respectively.

    • WindowController

      public WindowController()

  • Method Details

    • changeWindow

      public static void changeWindow(Segment window, ArrayList<Double> windowSize, javafx.scene.control.TextField xField, javafx.scene.control.TextField yField, javafx.scene.control.TextField xPrimeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField yPrimeField)
      Changes the values of the window based on the current values in the text fields.
      Parameters:
      window - the window segment to be updated
      windowSize - an ArrayList containing the maximum and minimum x and y values for the window
      xField - the text field for the x-coordinate of the window's starting point
      yField - the text field for the y-coordinate of the window's starting point
      xPrimeField - the text field for the x-coordinate of the window's ending point
      yPrimeField - the text field for the y-coordinate of the window's ending point

    • drawWindow

      public static void drawWindow(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, Segment window)
      Draws the window on the canvas using a red color and a 2-pixel wide stroke.
      Parameters:
      gc - the graphics context of the canvas on which the window is to be drawn
      window - the window segment to be drawn

    • isWindowGood

      public static boolean isWindowGood(Segment window, ArrayList<Double> windowSize)
      Checks if the current window is valid, meaning that its x and y values are less than its xPrime and yPrime values, respectively.
      Parameters:
      window - the window segment to be validated
      windowSize - an ArrayList containing the maximum and minimum x and y values for the window
      Returns:
      true if the window segment is valid, false otherwise
